name.japanese: リトル イースト ブルー

description: A village island modeled after the East Blue region, created as a nostalgic memorial by people from East Blue. The island features replica locations from the East Blue saga and serves as home to Boss, a giant modified beetle. It is characterized by its peaceful community and dedication to preserving East Blue culture and memories.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs. Largo Final Battle
keyEvents.description: The island serves as the battlefield for the climactic confrontation between Luffy and Largo.
keyEvents.significance: The fate of the island and its residents is decided in this battle.

keyEvents.title: Villagers' Guerrilla Attack
keyEvents.description: Nami leads the villagers through secret tunnels to launch a surprise attack on the Amigo Pirates.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the island's hidden infrastructure and the residents' willingness to fight for their home.

keyEvents.title: Defeat of Amigo Pirates
keyEvents.description: The villagers successfully capture and imprison the Amigo Pirates, protecting their island.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the empowerment and courage of Little East Blue's citizens.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Depart Little East Blue
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates bid farewell and leave the island, having saved it from the Amigo Pirates.
keyEvents.significance: Concludes the Little East Blue Arc with the island safe and its residents grateful.

statusHistory.reason: Island continues to thrive after being saved by the Straw Hats
